Imagine. Inspire. Influence.

DDB Asia is a cohesive collaboration of global businesses, including DDB (advertising), Tribal Worldwide (digital), DDB Remedy (healthcare and medical), Track (e-commerce) and TracyLocke (shopper marketing). Comprising of six offices in four countries, DDB Asia is part of the DDB Worldwide communications network and Omnicom Group.

"Early detection can rewrite the story for many families."

DDB Group Singapore has joined hands with the Breast Cancer Foundation to turn Malay classic 'Ibu' into a powerful anthem for change. 

The campaign is a response to the alarming statistic that less than 20% of Malay women in Singapore undergo mammograms, despite the fact that 1 in 13 women will face a breast cancer diagnosis in their lifetime. 'Voices for Ibu' seeks to break down barriers and encourage screenings, particularly among older Malay women.

Don't miss the stirring 5-minute tribute featuring a compelling ensemble of celebrities, survivors, caregivers, and community members.

It's all fun and games... until it isn't 🎮

Cybercriminals are on the prowl and even the strongest of gamers are vulnerable to data leaks and scams on unsecure gaming sites. 

Starring Indonesia’s leading action hero, Iko Uwais, the "Protect Your Play" campaign by DDB Group Singapore cautions against taking online security for granted in true cinematic style by highlighting Google Play's security technology that helps to protect transactions and user data from online hacker traps. 

Vinod Savio, CCO at DDB Group Singapore said, “Our task was to deliver a serious message in a way that gamers would not only enjoy but also sit up and pay attention.”

Read more on the work in Campaign Brief Asia here: https://lnkd.in/gijq7cnx

#DDB #DDBGroupSingapore #Google #GooglePlay #Creativity #Client #NewWork

Indonesia accounts for almost 46% of all gamers in Southeast Asia. The market is thriving, but so are data leaks and scams. DDB Group Singapore and Google Play have joined forces with martial arts superstar Iko Uwais to warn gamers of hacker traps in true cinematic style!
